scenario_text.value: I’d like to get your opinion too, Falcomon.

Yeah, what do you think? Should we stay here,
or go out and explore?

Well, it is no easy decision, but ultimately
I favor exploration.
Right? It’s the only real option!

We know too little of this world. We must
find how to save you, and identify threats.

We must of course be wary of enemies and the
fog, but it’s not as if we have no recourse.

If we sense danger, we can run. So long as we
are not pursued, we can stay safe.

Wow, good thinking, Falcomon! Not that
I really understand all of it.

You’ve put a lot of thought into this
strategy. I knew I could count on you.

Hey, what about me? I’d figured out that
much, too...

But there are benefits to staying here. You
should consider what everyone has to say.
Don’t worry, I will. Thanks, Falcomon.

Hm? You would speak with me? Shouldn’t you
see what Minoru has to say?
